title: Buffer overrun in Steam SILK voice decoder

activities.message:
Hi @slidybat,

Thank you for your submission. I hope you are well. Your report is currently being reviewed and the HackerOne triage team will get back to you once there is additional information to share.

Have a great day! 

Kind regards,
@ktistai

Hi @slidybat

At step 4, `send_voice_packet path\to\voice_payload` nothing happens for me but I think I have an idea why. I'm working on installing the audio drivers on both machines and get back to you asap. 

Thanks, 
@ktistai

PS: if you could make any comment so this gets back in the new state, that'd be awesome. It would help me see it again tomorrow in my queue.

Hi @ktistai,

Odd that it isn't doing anything, hopefully installing the audio drivers helps.

Thanks.
@slidybat , I've sent this to the team as my RDP does not have audio so I cannot trigger this. I was trying to find a fix but it's too far fetched and was taking too long.

Hi @slidybat, thanks for the excellent report! I've added a fix for this to the Steam beta version released earlier today (https://steamcommunity.com/groups/SteamClientBeta/announcements/detail/5211206153165966952) if you'd like to check that out to verify that the issue is fixed.

Hi @mikela,

I can confirm that this is fixed in the latest Steam beta release.

Thanks.

Hi @mikela,

Given that this has been fixed, can we get this marked as resolved?
Hi @slidybat, resolved as requested. Thanks again for the report!
Hi @slidybat, disclosed as requested. Thanks again!
